text: Minimalism seems closest to the sophisticated storytelling of movies. Movies have really educated contemporary audiences to be the most intelligent, sophisticated audiences in history. We don't any longer need to have the relationship between one scene and the next explained. We will figure it out ourselves.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

text: And I believe that you never be limited in what you do, so I like to do movies, I like to do television.
author: Harvey Fierstein

text: Movies are all about plot. Theater, even if it's story heavy, it's about ideas.
author: Harvey Fierstein

text: Theater has to resonate in your heart in a way that movies don't.
author: Harvey Fierstein

text: I was striving to be the most muscular man, and it got me into the movies. It got me everything that I have.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
